projects.name: Vue3-Matomo
projects.description: A Vue 3 plugin for Matomo analytics with TypeScript support. This package is a fork of vue-matomo by Dennis Ruhe, rewritten in TypeScript to target Vue 3, supports Composition and Options APIs, with event emits for script loading.

projects.name: Responsive-Vid
projects.description: A TypeScript-supported library for Vue 3, React, JavaScript modules, and browser scripts to dynamically swap video sources and posters based on media queries. Perfect for autoplaying background videos with varying file sizes or aspect ratios across viewport widthsâ€”or any media query condition like resolution or orientation.
